Kapil Sharma's Fee For The Second Season Of His Show Slashed By Half, Claim Reports
Kapil Sharma's Fee For The Second Season Of His Show Slashed By Half, Claim Reports
After a long gap of more than a year, India's comedian Kapil Sharma is back in the business and how! Kapil made the audience laugh with his jokes, there was a phase of a lull in Sharma's career when he courted multiple controversies and made headlines for all the bad reasons.
Sony TV
Well, where there is will, there is a way and to redeem his career and put it back on the track, Kapil Sharma signed the second season of his comedy show, for which he is also the producer.
Apart from Kapil, other comedians who are back for the second season include Kiku Sharda, Chandan Prabhakar, Sumona Chakravarti, and Rochelle Rao. Two new faces on the second season are Krushna Abhishek and Bharti Singh.
Sony TV
The first episode of the season was shot with the team of Simmba that included Ranveer Singh, Sara Ali Khan, and Rohit Shetty and received a big thumbs up from the fans.

While fans are rejoicing Sharma's comeback in the business, looks like he has not been a monetary sound option for the comedian. A Dainik Bhaskar report claims that Kapil agreed for a drastic pay cut for the new season of The Kapil Sharma Show.
Kapil was earning Rs 60-70 lakh per weekend episode but his fee has been slashed and now he reportedly earns Rs 15-20 lakh per weekend episode.
The two new entrants on the show Krushna Abhishek and Bharti Singh are close-behind and are the second highest paid on the show as they rake in Rs 10-12 lakh per weekend episode.
Sony TV
Not sure how Kapil feels about this but fans loved the second season and the episode starring Salman Khan, Arbaaz Khan and Sohail Khan and their father the veteran writer Salim Khan is all over the internet and is winning everyone's heart.
Not many know that Salman is also one of the producers of the show! Well, yes.
